mobitel weleda shri lanka telikom wethin mobitel paribhogikayanta pera gewum intarneti sewa ූlatanaeta wetha weleda shri lanka telikom wethin mobitel paribhogikayanta pera gewum intarneti sewa merata sanniwedana keshthraye pramukhaya wana shri lanka telikom samagama mobitel samagama samagin wyaparika washayen athikaragena athi sabandathawaya matha mobitel paribhogikayanta intar neti se 1213 ankaya amathimen gruhastha namawali thorathuru labaganime sewawa shri lanka telikom wethin 1213 ankaya amathimen gruhastha namawali thorathuru labaganime sewawa shri lanka telikom wethin prabhath withana shri lanka telikom aayathanaya wisin 1213 (gasthu rahitha) ankaya amathimen gruhastha namawali thorathuru laba ganime sewawa pasugiyada elidakwini.
